reviews.review: Portal is a magnificent puzzle game. The titillating wrongness of every solution and the wonky thinking required to get there make you feel like a space-folding genius, and yet you'll almost never get stuck.
老游戏了，还是好评，依旧有玩的空间
There have to be a joke here () somewhere?
Still a great game. A bit short tho...
Best game for logic tests and puzlles in half life styled engine

Man, this game is AWESOME! It's challenging, full of puzzles, and even features FPS-like gameplay. Overall GREAT graphics, great controls, and that one evil robot that you love to hate, (You all know who I mean. Name starts with a "G"! :D) all make this game worth the money it costs.
One of my favorite games of all time. Orignally played on ps3, then purcahsed on Steam. I played the story mode at least 8 time all the way through, and is still my favorite story in a game.

This game is so fucking awesome! Very nice puzzles and if you play it, you want to do it again!
(I beat it twice)
im only doing this review for the steam awards but game is good

A while ago I thought that Portal 2 was better, because it's just more Portal.

Portal feels like a work of art. Everything in the game has a purpose and fits into the nearly flawless mold that it set out to create. Everything is tonally, mechanically, and thematically consistent throughout the entire game. 

Portal 2 is only a very entertaining shadow of Portal.
Half-life ın hikayesi ile yarışabilecek nadir oyunlardan kesinlikle tavsiye edilir. Kısaca kesinlikle alıp oynayın.
The best puzzle game you can play
If you don't have this game, there is something wrong with you.
Amazing game all around, no matter how many time you replay it.
Still one of my favorite games it's funny and a fun game to play.
Portal is probably oone of the best first person puzzle games I've played! It's fun and there's always another challenge around the corner.

Zekanızı kullanarak bitirmezin gereken bir oyun. Bence güzel bir oyun ama kısa sürede bitiyor. 2 saat civarında oyunu bitirirsiniz. Dha uzun soluklu bir oyun arıyorsanız size göre değil. Eğer kısa bir zeka oyunu isterseniz hemen satın alın.
Simplismente perfeito para quem gosta de puzzles e história.
Un juegazo es corto pero es obligatorio tenerlo y pasartelo.

There is no cake

Everything has been a lie.
Игра шикарная ,но я ее не прошел так как я слишком тупой )
Too short story, but idea is so unique that I'm definitely giving a recommendation :)
Portal is amazing. I really like the concept of this game, along with the storyline, and I truly enjoyed it. On steam sales Portal is extremely discounted, so if you have the money, try it out!
It's brilliant, the sequel is brilliant, if you are reading this, and think there is any chance you might possibly enjoy this game......BUY THEM BOTH
This and Portal 2 are tied for being my most favorite games of all time. The puzzles are great and thought provoking. The writing and story are superb. This game is amazing
Portal e tão bom que... é Portal vei, só compra e joga
M  I  N  D  B  L  O  W  N
Muy bueno para jugar con amigos
the best game of its time
Got it tattooed, that should say enough
Хоть игрушка весьма старренькая, но всё так же может удивить своими головоломками. Перепроходил ей раз 10
Хорошие гонки! И подданые не жалуются "Милорд, казна пустеет..." В общем, 5 классов из 11 лет школы.
Игра очень годная, всем советую пройти.

Sempre ouvi muitas analises e feedbacks positivo desse jogo e por isso decide compra-lo. Apesar de curto, o jogo é muito divertido e da vontade de rejogar lo varias e varias vezes. Uma ótima compra, principalmente para passar o tempo num jogo que não tenha multijogador.
Aproveita as promoções da steam e compra ele que fica melhor ainda.
Спасибо, что приняли позу ожидания распорядителя вечеринки...
This game is great! It has inspired me to do more thinking, and to get into the franchize!
Одна из лучших головоломок, что я видел. Единственное что огорчает - спустя столько лет так и не поправили баг, когда при смерти главной героини появляется надпись "Гордон умер".
if you like puzzles this is for you
Incrivel, jogo genia. Um game definido pela palavra perfeição.
Excellent start to an amazing new series by Valve with incredible puzzles, a great story to get sucked into, with a unique concept and lots to enjoy!
Крута старая головоломка (я не про Кубик Рубик). Короче говоря, даст инпульс ваш мозг для разгадки уровней. Оценка 9 тортиков из 10. Торт это ложь.
Portal is a very good game, you must play it!
Macht auch nach langer Zeit immer wieder Spaß.
Very nice puzzle  with shoot shoot hole gun
Не жалею, что купил эту игру!)
Знаете,это игра привнесла очень многое в игровую индустрию.Не удевляйтесь,что я наиграл только 2 часа,наиграл я гораздо больше.Просто советую эту игру и надеюсь,я кому то помог с выбором
A unique and special game, amazing lonely atmosphere, immersive soundtrack, a great concept and GLADoS. The puzzles become easy to solve after playing this once but you'll never get tired of them.
